text:
James Martin Michael Hanifan (September 21, 1933 – November 24, 2020) was an American football coach. He was the head coach for the St. Louis Cardinals of the National Football League (NFL) from 1980 to 1985. In 1955, he played for the Toronto Argonauts. Hanifan was born in Compton, California.
Hanifan died on November 24, 2020 in St. Louis, Missouri at the age of 87.
